title: My Mama Saw The Video
itunes:title: My Mama Saw The Video
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am 34 years old and I’ve been dating a sexy, chocolate man for four years. We have a very active sex life and during the lockdown we started spicing things up and filming our exploits around the house. He’s very kinky and likes it when I dominate him and tie him up. We have a three year old son and because of the lockdown, my mother hasn’t been able to see him for almost a year. She told me no matter what my son does, she wants pictures or videos because she misses him so much..................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
